text: Svetozar "Toza" Cvetković (; born 20 June 1958) is a Serbian actor. He appeared in more than eighty films since 1980 and played the lead role in Do Not Forget Me Istanbul together with Mira Furlan. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !
